item.ptxt: Confirm the sheet thickness, tensile strength, and existence of the zinc treatment of both sides, and set the welder to conform to the welding conditions by referring to Roof and Side Panel Construction, and Floor and Rear Body Construction.
Welding symbols (The welding symbols with dashed lines have a meaning of the spot welding of the part which is not visible)

s1.ptxt: Clamp the new center inner pillar (A) and the side sill stiffener (B), and tighten the mounting bolt. Install the center pillar inner separator (C) on the side sill stiffener.
Clamp the new center pillar stiffener complete, and check the body dimensions:
Tack weld the center inner pillar, the side sill stiffener, and the center pillar stiffener complete.
Check the body dimensions:

Temporarily install the front fender, the doors, and the windshield, then check for differences in level and clearance.Check the external parts fitting positions. Make sure the body lines flow smoothly.
From the passenger's compartment, weld the center inner pillar (A) and the side sill stiffener (B) to the inside sill (C).
( )*: Welding positions with MPa or higher parts. Confirm the plug welding conditions.
From the passenger's compartment, weld the center inner pillar (A) to the roof side rail (B).
( )*: Welding positions with MPa or higher parts. Confirm the plug welding conditions.
Weld the center pillar stiffener (A) to the roof side stiffener (B).
()*: Welding positions with the center pillar stiffener, high-strength steel ( MPa) parts. Confirm the MIG brazing conditions.
From the passenger's compartment, weld the font edge of the side sill stiffener (A) to the inner lower pillar (B).
( )*: Welding positions with MPa or higher parts. Confirm the plug welding conditions.
Weld the side sill stiffener (A) to the front pillar lower stiffener (B).
( )*: Welding positions with MPa or higher parts. Confirm the plug welding conditions.
Weld the center pillar stiffener (A) to the side sill stiffener (B).
( )*: Welding positions with MPa or higher parts. Confirm the plug welding conditions.
Weld the side sill stiffener (A) to the front jack-up base (B) and the side sill extension (C).
Weld the side sill stiffener (A) to the center inner lower extension (B) and the inside sill (C).
Install the new front pillar outer separator on the front pillar lower stiffener.Apply the sealer without gaps all the way around the separator and inside the outer panel repair part.
Install the new center pillar outer separator on the center pillar stiffener.Apply the sealer without gaps all the way around the separator and inside the outer panel repair part.
Clamp the outer panel repair part, and recheck the clearance and alignment of the front fender and the doors.
Do the main welding.Weld the outer panel repair part (A).

()*: Welding positions with the center pillar stiffener (B), high-strength steel ( MPa) parts. Perform the spot welding on the conditions of No. and No. in the table shown below. Confirm the MIG brazing conditions.
NOTE: Also when replacing the outer panel only, weld the outer panel on the same conditions.
Refer to the front pillar and side sill outer panel welding positions for except the center pillar outer panel welding positions:

ptxt.sie-ref02: Front pillar outer panel welding positions

ptxt.sie-ref03: Side sill outer panel welding positions

s1.ptxt: From the passenger's compartment, insert the nozzle through the hole of the center inner pillar (A), and apply the sealer (B) without gaps all the way around the separator (C) and between the center pillar lower stiffener (D) and the side sill stiffener (E).

item.ptxt: Confirm the sheet thickness, tensile strength, and existence of the zinc treatment of both sides, and set the welder to conform to the welding conditions by referring to Roof and Side Panel Construction, and Floor and Rear Body Construction.
Welding symbols (The welding symbols with dashed lines have a meaning of the spot welding of the part which is not visible)
L and L*=Welding length; unit: mm (in)

trans.title: In case of the side sill stiffener replacement

s1.ptxt: Install the new front pillar inner separator on the front pillar lower stiffener. Apply the sealer without gaps all the way around the separator and the inner lower pillar.
Clamp the new side sill stiffener (A), and tighten the mounting bolt.
Install the center pillar inner separator (A) on the side sill stiffener (B).
Clamp the front pillar stiffener and the new center pillar stiffener, and check the body dimensions:
Tack weld the front pillar stiffener, the side sill stiffener, and the center pillar stiffener, except lower part of the center pillar stiffener in case of the side sill stiffener replacement.
Check the body dimensions:

Temporarily install the front fender, the doors, and the windshield, then check for differences in level and clearance.Check the external parts fitting positions. Make sure the body lines flow smoothly.

trans.title: In case of the side sill stiffener replacement

s1.ptxt: From the passenger's compartment, weld the font edge of the side sill stiffener (A) to the inner lower pillar (B).
( )*: Welding positions with MPa or higher parts. Confirm the plug welding conditions.
Remove the lower part of the center pillar stiffener, and weld the center inner pillar (A) and the side sill stiffener (B) to the inside sill (C).
Weld the front pillar lower stiffener to the side sill stiffener and the upper stiffener (driver's side).

trans.title: In case of the center pillar stiffener replacement

s1.ptxt: Weld the center pillar stiffener (A) to the roof side stiffener (B).
( )*: Welding positions with MPa or higher parts. Confirm the plug welding conditions.
Weld the center pillar stiffener (A) to the side sill stiffener (B).
( )* and L*: Welding positions with MPa or higher parts. Confirm the plug and butt welding conditions.

figure.title: In case of the side sill stiffener replacement
In case of the center pillar stiffener replacement

trans.title: In case of the side sill stiffener replacement

s1.ptxt: Weld the side sill stiffener (A) to the front jack-up base (B) and the side sill extension (C).
Install the new front pillar outer separator on the front pillar lower stiffener.Apply the sealer without gaps all the way around the separator and inside the outer panel repair part.
Install the new center pillar outer separator on the center pillar stiffener.Apply the sealer without gaps all the way around the separator and inside the outer panel repair part.
Clamp the outer panel repair part, and recheck the clearance and alignment of the front fender and the doors.
Do the main welding.Weld the outer panel repair part (A).
Refer to the front pillar and side sill outer panel welding positions for except the center pillar outer panel welding positions:

ptxt.sie-ref01: Front pillar outer panel and lower stiffener welding positions

ptxt.sie-ref02: Side sill outer panel welding positions

figure.title: In case of the side sill stiffener replacement
In case of the side sill stiffener replacement or the outer panel replacement only

s1.ptxt: From the passenger's compartment, insert the nozzle through the hole of the center inner pillar (A), and apply the sealer (B) without gaps all the way around the separator (C) and between the center pillar lower stiffener (D) and the side sill stiffener (E).

trans.title: In case of the side sill stiffener replacement
